public class AutoNavy
extends Navy
A Navy played by the computer. This is where the intelligence should go.

app
hitpos
This is a position where we know we did hit something.

AutoNavy(Applet, WorriedSea)
This constructor places the computers ships in a semirandom way.

MakeMove(WorriedSea)
Find a good place to drop a bomb.

app

hitpos 
 Coord hitpos
This is a position where we know we did hit something.

AutoNavy 
  public AutoNavy(Applet app,
                  WorriedSea sea)
This constructor places the computers ships in a semirandom way. This currently works this (simple) way: Take a random number n and select the n'th of a fixed set of layouts.

MakeMove 
  public void MakeMove(WorriedSea sea)
Find a good place to drop a bomb.
